title: Bug 13620: Java Source Attachment Preference Page has excessive whitespace
OB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has a label with a large amount of white space in the middle of the page.
EB: The vertical alignment of the label should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1) Load a project from the repository.
2) Select a source folder.
3) Open Properties.
4) Select Java Source Attachment.
5) [Details] - An info label will appear in the middle of the dialog.
